channel.title: Pi code to Rs2HD [Convert Req]

item.title: Pi code to Rs2HD [Convert Req]
item.dc:creator: @mothaukuka mothaukuka
item.description:
@mothaukuka wrote:

Ok, the following code is for use within PI servers.

public static boolean saveUserInfo(Client c){ try { Statement statement = conn.createStatement(); ResultSet group = statement.executeQuery("SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = '"+ c.playerName + "'"); query("DELETE FROM `users` WHERE username = '"+ c.playerName + "'"); if (!group.next()) statement.execute("INSERT INTO `users` (`username`, `password`, `rights`) VALUES ('"+c.playerName+"', '"+c.playerPass+"', '"+c.playerRights+"')"); } catch (Exception sqlEx) { sqlEx.printStackTrace(); } return true; }

Is anyone able to Convert this into Rs2HD compatible? (562)

Thanks in Advance.

Read full topic
